verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] barbacoa my husband adores this beef roast simmered in lime juice chipotle and cumin he would eat it one a week if i would make it that often we have it over rice with cilantro and a spritz of lime —aundrea mccormick denver colorado
